entry.source: The gods of India are trying to use the waters{F801}of Tokyo Bay to create Soma. To make a rope for{F801}this process, they need the hide of a Drake{F801}{F804,5}Vasuki.{F804,0} If you are willing to give us{F801}some, meet me in {F804,5}Shinjuku.{F804,0} Although{F801}Drake {F804,5}Vasuki{F804,0}s are rarely seen, they can{F801}be found all over the place, so keep looking.{F801}
